title: Chestnut & Ginger Tart
directions: Whisk together the puree, crème fraiche and egg yolks until blended. In a separate, clean bowl, whisk the egg whites until they are stiff and form peaks. Fold the egg yolks gently into the filling mix.
Fill the pie case and bake at 200 / gas 6 for 30 minutes.
Serve with Apricot compote and a drizzle of fresh cream.
ingredients: In a food processor, or in a bowl with a wooden spoon, cream the icing sugar and butter together. Beat in two egg yolks.
Add the flour and blitz until a fine crumb is achieved.
Add water until the mix comes together and forms a ball.
Wrap in cling film and chill for 30 mins. Pre-heat the oven 160/ gas 3
Grease and line a 24cm flan/tart case with the pastry and blind bake for 25 minutes
Place all the ingredients in a pan and simmer for 5 minutes until the sugar is well dissolved.
Blitz in a food processor until a smooth puree is achieved. Cool.
